title: DAZ3D Poser - Apollonia Hair for VAGS4 - DIM Format
description:
Apollonia Hair for VA4. Looks great on later DAZ models Genesis+ with autofit too.

Apollonia Hair is a romantic up-do that is simply stunning!
The hair is tied at the top, giving height and volume, with a lovely flower band that is able to be morphed to various styles.
Soft bangs that fall from the forehead, can also be styled or be hidden.
Beautiful smooth textures in 50 exquisite natural and fantasy colors offer great variety and realism.
Sweet or windblown and wild, this gorgeous hairstyle is meant to transform your renders to romantic works of art!

This product includes:
1 Universal Hair Prop (fitted to V4 by default)
1 obj
29 realistic hair textures + 21 fantasy hair textures (50 Hair color Mat poses)
15 flower and pearl textures
2 transparency textures + 1 specular texture + 2 bump textures
80 styling + 23 fitting and adjusting morphs (total 103 morphs)
28 ready style poses + 1 reset pose
7 Universal Hair Prop fit poses for Aiko 4, Girl 4, Kids 4, Little One, Miki 3, Stephanie 4 and Victoria 4

3 adjust morphs can be used to adjust forehead, temples and sideburns distance to custom characters for maximum fitting, when the bangs are hidden.
